data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bagalkot, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bagalkot, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Bagalkot you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bagalkot, Karnataka, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Bagalkot, Karnataka, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bawtar people.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Bagalkot, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bagalkot, Karnataka, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, fill the 1,889,800 souls living in the county of Bagalkot with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

location.name: Bagalkot
location.people_groups_list: Halleer, Sudra, Giddikki, Halwakki Wakkal, Beldar Urindavan
